peopleAlsoAsk.question: What is the best way to get old coins appraised?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Consider having your coins appraised by a certified numismatist or a reputable coin dealer. This will give you a professional estimate of their value. Local Coin Shops: Visit local dealers who can appraise and buy coins directly. This can provide immediate cash but may offer lower prices than other methods.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: I have a great deal of valuable coins. How do I sell them, and where? - Quora

peopleAlsoAsk.question: How do you know if a coin appraiser is legit?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Research Appraisers: Look for reputable coin appraisers or numismatists. You can find them through: - Professional organizations like the American Numismatic Association (ANA). - Local coin shops or dealers with good reviews. - Online directories of certified appraisers.
